OpenSSH 7.2.advice: Upgrade to a newer version. Disable roaming feature in ssh_config.

vsftpd 2.3.4.advice: Remove this version. Use a secure FTP alternative or restrict access.

Apache 2.2.advice: Upgrade to Apache 2.4+. Disable legacy modules.

Microsoft IIS 6.0.advice: Migrate away from IIS 6.0. It is end-of-life and insecure by design.

ProFTPD 1.3.5.advice: Upgrade to 1.3.6 or higher. Consider disabling mod_copy if not needed.

MySQL 5.5.advice: Upgrade to 5.7+. Avoid using root for remote access.

nginx 1.4.advice: Upgrade to 1.6+. Enable rate limiting and validate client requests.
